articles.author: Michelle Starr
articles.title: Fossil of a 'Giant' Trapdoor Spider Found in Australia, And Just Look at It! - ScienceAlert
articles.description: Even millions of years ago, Australia was a paradise for spiders.
articles.content:
Even millions of years ago, Australia was a paradise for spiders.
In the arid heart of the continent, scientists have found an exquisitely preserved fossil of a fascinatingly large spider that roame… [+4023 chars]
